name: Flashbang
description:
-GAME MAY TAKE 10-20 SECONDS TO LOAD, PLEASE BE PATIENT-

Part of the GMTK Game Jam, Joined Together!

Play through some mean cyberpunk streets,  with your robot buddy turned flashlight strapped behind you. With a gun in one hand and a light source behind you, you'll have to platform, switch, and see your way to victory against an army of robots.

There's a collectible coin inside each level for an extra challenge. Try to find it!

Controls:

Left - A
Right - D
Jump - W
Drop - S
Reload - R
Shoot - Left Click
Switch Character - Right Click
